title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing a SaveAs operation for a java file, the file extension is not included in the saved file's name in the Navigator.
EB: When performing a SaveAs operation for a java file, the saved file should have the correct file extension in its name in the Navigator.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file. 
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class). 
3) Click on the SaveAs icon (located next to the Save icon). A dialog window will appear. 
4) Browse for a valid container location. 
5) Type the filename in the 'File name' field, but ignore the file extension as it is not specifically requested. 
6) Click on the 'Ok' button. 
7) Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location with the correct file extension visible in the file's name.
